com.sample.diogripper.usercommandscreen_info_001: Before you start, You have to set 'tool weight' and 'TCP(Tool Center Point).
com.sample.diogripper.usercommandscreen_info_002: - Case 1. Use Tool setting in the upper right corner. You have to change level to 'Manual Level'.
com.sample.diogripper.usercommandscreen_info_003: - Case 2. Use 'set' command in the Command list. You can find it in the 'Other' category.
com.sample.diogripper.toast_message_001: Save Gripper Setting to User Command
com.sample.diogripper.toast_message_007: Change the robot status to manual mode to execute this feature.
com.sample.diogripper.toast_message_008: Stop the DRL/task to execute this feature.
com.sample.diogripper.Dialog_message_001: There is unsaved data. To save and close the module, click the 'Save and Close' button.
com.sample.diogripper.Dialog_message_005: There is already a duplicate name. Click the 'OK' button and it will be overwritten.
com.sample.diogripper.Dialog_error_message_001: There is already a duplicate name.
com.sample.diogripper.Dialog_error_message_003: Only letters (A-Z, a-z), numbers (0-9) and underscores (_ ) are allowed.
com.sample.diogripper.reset_menu_label: Select template data to use default values.
